description:
Luffy tries to chase down the Yetti Cool Brothers, but Franky`s still trapped in Chopper`s Body makes his mission extremely difficult. Just when all appears lost, an unexpected ally lends a hand!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au secours de Nami. Combat enneigé pour luffy
Nami o Sukue! Luffy Yukiyama no Tatakai
Salvare Nami! Luffy contro i sicari delle montagne innevate
Save Nami! Luffy`s Fight on the Snow-Capped Mountains
¡Salvaré a Nami! El combate de Luffy en la montaña nevada
Спасти Нами! Бой Луффи в снежных горах!
أنقذ نامي! معركة لوفي في الجبال الثلجيّة!
ナミを救え!ルフィ雪山の戦い
